name: Advantix Digital
description:
Advantix Digital was founded in 2001 as one of the nation’s first digital marketing agencies in Dallas. Since then, we have become a 5x Google All-Star, putting us in the top 0.5% of agencies in the US, awarded by Clutch and leading the Dallas Fort Worth Area in the Voice Search Optimization Revolution. All of our strategists are certified by Google, Facebook, Bing, HIPAA and more!
Featured as one of Inc.’s 5000 fastest growing companies, we offer digital branding, web design, SEO, paid media management and programmatic services, along with our consulting capabilities.
READ MORE...
